attributes.action: Allow us to rate in a 5 stage process the goverments response to these e-petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having signed a bundle of these e-petitions and read the governments resposes to them I find I have no further way to give feedback ie. the government has the last word which isn't always satisfactory. I propose there be a 5-stage rating system for:
Did this response provide an adequate respond to your concerns?
1 - Not at all
2 -  
3 - 
4 - 
5 - Yes completely

rejection.details: We will treat this as very useful feedback.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
